entry.entryTitle: How is HTML5 different from programming languages such as C++, C, C#, Visual Basic and Java?
entry.paragraph: HTML5 is a markup language that specifies the structure and content of documents that are displayed in web browsers.

entry.entryTitle: What elements and/or declarations are required in an HTML5 document?
entry.paragraph: The document type declaration <!DOCTYPE html> is required in HTML5 documents so that browsers render the page in standards mode.
